titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/26/2012--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects a specified named Member to the following House Committees: (1) Armed Services, and (2) Homeland Securities.
